source:
TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Nielden would go to the side of someone who needs him.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Schwierigkeitsanpassung<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Nielden will so schnell wie möglich zu Callea.

source:
TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_01<tab>Nielden shares with you some more background about his fallen friend Colphas, and how he raised his daughter Callea all by himself. The Galdjent guard also confesses a lack of confidence that he will be able to offer the girl everything she needs, and asks if you would be willing to go with him and lend a helping hand. Moved by his generosity and sympathy for the orphaned girl's plight, he resolves to make the trip back to Fort Jobb.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_01<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Die Schwierigkeit des Auftrags wird an die aktuelle Stufe angepasst.

Nielden möchte, dass du ihm hilfst, die Tochter seines gefallenen Freundes in dieser schweren Stunde zu unterstützen. Kehr in die Jobb-Feste zurück und sprich mit Callea.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_02<tab>Back at Fort Jobb, Callea profusely expresses her gratitude to you and Nielden, though it is clear that the girl is still struggling to come to terms with her father's sudden passing. Feeling that she is woefully unprepared to follow on in her father's footsteps, she has a mind to close down the infirmary and begin a new life in the Crystarium. At Nielden's asking, you set off for the city to arrange temporary lodgings for Callea with Sylgham at the Catenaries.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_02<tab>Callea will die Praxis ihres Vaters schließen und nach Crystarium übersiedeln. Begib dich in die Ikosagon-Quartiere und sprich mit dem Verwalter Sylgham, damit er ihr eine Unterkunft reserviert.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_03<tab>At the Catenaries, the clerk Sylgham sympathizes with Callea's plight. Despite the recent trying circumstances, he is pleased to be able to inform you a room has just opened up, and offers to reserve it immediately for your orphaned acquaintance. Brave the road back to Fort Jobb and share the good news with your friends.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_03<tab>Sylgham verspricht, ein Quartier für Callea vorzubereiten. Berichte Callea in der Jobb-Feste davon.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_04<tab>You return to Fort Jobb to a disconcerting scene. Though Nielden and Callea are pleased to hear the news, they seem preoccupied with something that has happened in your absence. Allow Callea a moment to compose herself, and then inquire as to what the matter is.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SEQ_04<tab>Callea dankt dir, aber anscheinend hat sich in der Zwischenzeit ein Problem ergeben.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Callea at Fort Jobb.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_TODO_00<tab>In der Jobb-Feste mit Callea sprechen

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Sylgham at the Catenaries.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_TODO_01<tab>In den Ikosagon-Quartieren mit Sylgham sprechen

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Callea at Fort Jobb.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_TODO_02<tab>Callea in der Jobb-Feste Bericht erstatten

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_000<tab>Well, there's nothin' to be gained from standin' around here mopin'. Callea needs me, so I'd best take to the road.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_000<tab>Tut mir leid. Da starre ich hier Löcher in die Luft, wo Callea doch so dringend Beistand nötig hat. Ich mache mich gleich auf den Weg.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_001<tab>Colphas lost both his dear wife and parents not long after the girl was born. Raised Callea all by himself, he did. They weren't rich by any means, but still he saw that she wanted for nothing.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_001<tab>Kommst du auch mit? Es wäre nicht schlecht, wenn noch jemand mit anpackt.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_002<tab>I can't even imagine what the poor girl's goin' through, all alone in this dangerous world. As Colphas's close friend, it's my duty to be there for her an' see to whatever she needs.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_002<tab>Callea hatte nämlich niemanden außer ihrem Vater. Ihre Mutter und ihre Großeltern sind allesamt früh gestorben. Jetzt muss sie nicht nur die Hinterlassenschaft ihres Vaters verwalten, sondern auch sehen, wie sie selbst ihren Unterhalt bestreitet.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_003<tab>Come to think of it, don't suppose ye'd be interested in comin' along? I'm just one man, and lookin' after Callea isn't likely to be an easy task.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_003<tab>Zu zweit können wir ihr zumindest über die erste schwierige Zeit helfen. Also, kommst du mit?

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_004<tab>Yer a lifesaver, friend! I'm sure that it'll mean the world to the girl. And with that, I'd best be gatherin' my belongings. See ye back at Fort Jobb!
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_004<tab>Vielen Dank. Wenn du noch was zu erledigen hast, kannst du das natürlich noch tun. Ich gehe schon mal vor. Bis gleich!

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_011<tab>Uncle Nielden...you came all the way here for me?
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_011<tab>Ach, Nielden ... Ich danke dir, dass du gekommen bist.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_012<tab>And you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... How can I ever repay you for your generosity?
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_012<tab>Und du ... Du hast nicht nur die Nachricht für mich überbracht, sondern dir sogar die Zeit genommen, wieder zu mir zurückzukehren. Vielen Dank.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_013<tab>Think nothin' of it, girl! Poor thing...ye've been through more than any child should have to suffer. But don't you worry─Uncle Nielden and <var 08 E905 ((Aunt)) ((Uncle)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> are here to see to your every need.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_013<tab>Das ist eine schwere Zeit für dich, aber wir beide werden eine Weile hierbleiben und dir helfen, wo wir können.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_014<tab>You truly are too kind... Everyone has been─why, even those here in the fort I have never spoken to before have stopped by to offer their sympathies. Whatever have I done to deserve such kindness?
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_014<tab>Ihr seid wirklich zu gütig. Und auch die Leute der Siedlung zeigen so viel Mitgefühl<var 1D /var>... Ich weiß gar nicht, wie ich euch all die Fürsorge entgelten soll.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_015<tab>Reckon yer old man is to thank for that. The people loved him, Callea, and they know that his daughter and assistant is cut from the same cloth. Ye've got nothin' to feel guilty about.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_015<tab>Die Leute des Dorfs haben deinen Vater verehrt. Da ist es selbst<var 16 /var>verständ<var 16 /var>lich, dass sie sich um dich, seine einzige Tochter, kümmern. Nimm die Hilfe ruhig an.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_016<tab>What...what are you saying, Uncle Nielden? It's my fault...all of it. I never should have let him go to that terrible place...
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_016<tab>Wenn ich ... Wenn ich ihn aufgehalten hätte ...

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_017<tab>Don't even think of blamin' yerself for that, Callea. Yer father went there because he felt it was his duty. A hundred men couldn't have stopped that stubborn bastard once he made up his mind.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_017<tab>Das hättest du nicht gekonnt. Er ist nach Holminster, weil er es nicht aushielt, tatenlos abzuwarten. Weil er sich für das Überleben der Opfer verantwortlich fühlte. Niemand hätte es ihm ausreden können.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_018<tab>Yes, this is what everyone tells me. That Father was a talented physician, and a great man. That he is a hero who did not shy in the face of danger, and sacrificed himself in the name of our cause. This I know, and yet...and yet...
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_018<tab>Das sagen alle ... Alle preisen meinen Vater für seinen Mut und seine Opferbereitschaft.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_019<tab>To me, he was my <var 1A 02 /var>father<var 1A 01 /var>! As cruel as it sounds, I couldn't care less that he died a hero! I wanted him to <var 1A 02 /var>live<var 1A 01 /var>! But still, he left me... He...he did not even give me the chance to say good-bye...
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_019<tab>Und am Ende hat er sein eigenes Leben geopfert! Warum musste er sich immer für andere in Gefahr begeben?! Warum hat er mich verlassen?!

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_020<tab>Callea... Yer old man may have left ye here, but ye never left his mind and heart...not for one moment. Ye were more important to him than anythin'.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_020<tab>Callea. Red dir nicht ein, dass seine Patienten ihm wichtiger gewesen seien als du. Das stimmt einfach nicht. Du warst sein Ein und Alles, und das weißt du.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_021<tab>I know this, and yet...I do not understand. His duty, his patients, his daughter...how could any one man be so selfless!? Did he never stop to think of <var 1A 02 /var>himself<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_021<tab>Natürlich hat er mich nicht absichtlich allein gelassen. Aber er hätte wissen müssen, dass es so enden würde! War sein eigenes Leben denn nichts wert? Warum musste er es wegwerfen?!

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_100_021<tab>Forgive me, my friends. I...I am still feeling a bit overwhelmed by it all.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_100_021<tab>Bitte entschuldigt. Das ... Das ist alles zu viel für mich.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_022<tab>No apologies needed, girl. Ye've had it harder than any of us. And yet, we have to carry on without him somehow...all of us do. So tell me, Callea. What do ye plan on doin' now?
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_022<tab>Sei tapfer, Callea. Im Moment hast du vielleicht keinen Kopf dafür, aber du solltest dir bald Gedanken darüber machen, wie es weitergehen soll. Willst du hier in der Festung bleiben?

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_023<tab>The sick and wounded still show up at these doors. My heart aches for them, yet I am but a physician's assistant. I simply cannot offer them the treatment that Father once did.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_023<tab>Nein ... Ich habe meinem Vater immer geholfen, aber ganz eigenständig eine Praxis leiten wie er könnte ich nicht.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_024<tab>And so I think I will head for the Crystarium. I will shutter the doors of the infirmary, sell the furniture and equipment for what little they are worth, and use the coin to fund my trip.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_024<tab>Ich werde sie schließen, alles verkaufen und nach Crystarium gehen.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_025<tab>Aye...perhaps that would be for the best. It'd be safe there, at least, an' as good a place as any to start a new life.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_025<tab>Hm. Das ist vielleich sogar das Beste. In Crystarium bist du wenigstens sicher.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_026<tab>There's a residence hall there─the Catenaries, they call it─where they give room and board to refugees and others lookin' to make the Crystarium their new home. You can take shelter there till ye find a job and place of yer own.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_026<tab>In den Ikosagon-Quartieren nehmen sie noch neue Bewohner auf. Dort kannst du sicher unterkommen.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_027<tab>Say, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, would ye mind goin' on ahead to make the arrangements? The boy Sylgham there's an acquaintance of mine. Space is always tight, but let him know of Callea's situation and I reckon he'll be able to find a room for her.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_027<tab>Kannst du dem Verwalter Sylgham dort die Lage schildern und fragen, ob das in Ordnung geht? Ich helfe Callea inzwischen, ihre Sachen zu packen.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_028<tab>I cannot even begin to express the depths of my gratitude, friend. Thank you.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_028<tab>Das ist wirklich nett von dir, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Vielen Dank.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_100_040<tab>Greetings, and welcome to the Catenaries. How may I be of service to you today?

TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_040<tab>A young girl has been orphaned at Fort Jobb, you say? This is tragic, indeed. But worry not─a room just opened up earlier today. I will reserve it for Miss Callea straightaway.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_040<tab>Aha, das tut mir wirklich leid für die Kleine. Da werde ich gleich ein Zimmer für sie vorbereiten, keine Frage. Wir haben ja glück<var 16 /var>licher<var 16 /var>weise noch einige frei.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_041<tab>Your timing is most fortunate. Ever since the raid on Holminster Switch, refugees have been pouring in day after day, and our rooms can only hold so many.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_041<tab>Allerdings nicht mehr allzu viele. Nach dem Angriff auf Holminster haben die Überlebenden scharenweise bei uns Zuflucht genommen.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_042<tab>But do not worry. We will do everything we can for your young acquaintance. There are others here who have suffered similar tragedies, and can doubtless sympathize with her plight. She will be among friends.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_042<tab>Und es kommen immer mehr. Sie haben alles verloren und können nirgendwohin. Callea muss sich nach ihrem Verlust ähnlich entwurzelt fühlen.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_043<tab>Needless to say, I and the rest of the staff will also watch over her closely, and see to her needs until such time as she has acclimated to life here in the Crystarium. Tell her to come in safety, and that we look forward to welcoming her to our halls.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_043<tab>Ich werde tun, was ich kann, damit sie sich in ihrer neuen Umgebung gut einlebt. Richte ihr bitte aus, dass sie sich keine Sorgen machen soll. Sie ist hier nicht allein mit ihrem Schmerz.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_044<tab>The necessary paperwork has been filed, and there will be a room waiting for Miss Callea upon her arrival. You may tell the girl and Nielden that there is naught to worry about.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_SYLGHAM_000_044<tab>Ich werde ein Zimmer für Colphas' Tochter vorbereiten. Sag ihr, dass sie sich keine Sorgen machen soll. Ich werde tun, was ich kann, damit sie sich in ihrer neuen Umgebung gut einlebt.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_050<tab>Ah, there ye are. I trust all went well at the Crystarium? 'Fraid to say we had somethin' of an incident here. I'll let Callea give ye the news...
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_NIELDEN_000_050<tab>Ah, schon zurück? Leider muss ich dir sagen, dass sich die Umstände inzwischen etwas geändert haben. Callea wird es dir erklären.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_051<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I cannot thank you enough for all that you have done for me. I very much look forward to settling in to my new home at the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_051<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, danke, dass du für mich den Weg nach Crystarium auf dich genommen hast.

source: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_052<tab>And yet I fear there's been something of a complication. Uncle Nielden and I had all but finished packing my things, when...! Ah, but forgive me a moment. I must collect my thoughts.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE102_03457_CALLEA_000_052<tab>Nielden hat mir geholfen, die Hinterlassenschaft meines Vaters zu ordnen. Aber nun hat sich ein anderes Problem ergeben<var 1D /var>...
